scripts.prestyle: prejss-cli src/resets/*.css --out-dir dist/resets --format commonjs && prejss-cli src/utilities/*.css --out-dir dist/utilities --format commonjs
scripts.style: postcss src/base/index.css -o dist/base.css && postcss src/styled/index.css -o dist/styled.css && postcss src/full/index.css -o dist/full.css && postcss src/themes/index.css -o dist/themes.css
scripts.poststyle: prejss-cli dist/base.css --format commonjs && prejss-cli dist/styled.css --format commonjs && prejss-cli dist/themes.css --format commonjs
scripts.postrtl: prejss-cli dist/base.rtl.css --format commonjs && prejss-cli dist/styled.rtl.css --format commonjs
scripts.build: npm run style && npm run rtl
scripts.add: touch src/base/components/$npm_config_name.css && touch src/styled/components/$npm_config_name.css && echo '@import "./components/'$npm_config_name'";' >> src/base/index.css && echo '@import "./components/'$npm_config_name'";' >> src/styled/index.css && open src/base/components/$npm_config_name.css && open src/styled/components/$npm_config_name.css
